products.title: Bus & Truck Simulator
products.subTitle: Drive your truck or bus along the roads in a detailed environment!
products.description:
Start by working for a transport company and make progress until you get your own vehicle and become autonomous!
Purchase your truck / trailer set from a wide variety of vehicles (including bi-trains) that faithfully reproduce reality. More vehicles will be added soon.
Modify your vehicles however you like, paint, wheels, taillights, suspension height and other accessories! Create your custom skin!
Unique system of contracts, deliver cargo or passengers to the companies / bus stations with its own trailer / bus. Get access to the map at any time, manage your routes and loads to maximize your income.
